summary: Tony: Bucky can’t be good at everything.  Tony: He can’t be good at kissing. He’s been a mind zombie for 70 plus years.  Clint:...
body:
Tony: Bucky can’t be good at everything. 

Tony: He can’t be good at kissing. He’s been a mind zombie for 70 plus years. 

Clint: No. He’s good at kissing too

Tony: What?

Clint: What?

reblog.comment:

Tony: He can’t be good at kissing. He’s been a mind zombie for 70 plus years. 

Clint: No. He’s good at kissing too

Tony: What?

Clint: What?

Clint: What?

Tony: Bucky can’t be good at everything. 

Tony: He can’t be good at kissing. He’s been a mind zombie for 70 plus years. 

Clint: No. He’s good at kissing too

Tony: What?

blog.name: allfandomnerd

blog.description: AN EXCLUSIVE MULTI FANDOM BLOG. On the menu I have: a daily dose of INCORRECT QUOTES & posts for the MARVEL, AVENGERS, SHERLOCK, FIGURE SKATING, PERCY JACKSON, HEROES OF OLYMPUS, TRIALS OF APOLLO, KINGSMAN, THE HUNGER GAMES, TAYLOR SWIFT, GAME OF THRONES, NARNIA & X MEN FANDOM. Also HOT & SPICY (lol) posts regarding SOME OF THE BEST TEA SPILLING SHIPS including my OTP BUCKYNAT/ WINTERWIDOW, VIRTUEMOIR, CHERIK, PERCABETH, CALEO, SOLANGELO, CRESSIDALE & the-long-dead-but-still-alive-in-my-heart-ship CLATO. FOLLOW NOW TO GET A FREE DAILY DOSE OF FEELS, LAUGHTER & FUN.

blog.name: ceasarslegion
blog.title: Millennials Are Broke Bc We Are Greedily Using Both Kidneys
blog.description:
20y/o, Canadian third culture kid studying too many things, those being a double major in PoliSci and Film as well as a minor in History. I dabble in both film and stage acting, and if all else fails I can guarantee myself a major role in the MCU by dyeing my hair blond and changing my name to Chris. MGS, Fallout + Elder Scrolls, Marvel and the McElroy brothers, mostly. Local Tony Stark and Peter Parker gremlin. Green Day still owns my entire ass in the music department.
My RedBubble is SnakeDogs

blog.name: marvelfamilysstuff
blog.title: One Last Sacrifice
blog.description:
ALWAYS OPEN FOR REQUESTS ♡
Love you 3000
Est. 2017 
Mexican American | 19 | CA

body:
Trouble

paring: mob!bucky/mob!frank x reader

summary: Your brother Frank was man who looked for trouble and Bucky was just that. As much as he tried to make sure you didn’t get involved trouble, he knew it wouldn’t stop you from getting involved with it.

warnings: cursing

Growing up, you never questioned anything your older brother did. You grew up in a unforgiving environment and Frank didn’t want you to see that side of life. So he helped as much as he could to keep you hidden from that. What that meant though was trouble.

Trouble’s name was Bucky, well actually it was James, but the whole city new him as Bucky and he liked to keep it that way. Let’s just say that around the streets you knew, he ruled with an iron fist. No one dared try to intimidate him or his posse. 

What you never knew was that your brother took care of some dirty work that Bucky couldn’t be bothered to deal with. Mainly because he had an image to keep and even though neither of you knew of each other personally, he knew about you.

Frank was the kind of guy who tried to see some positives in life. After work, he would be invited to dinners with Bucky. Between steak and beer, he would talk about the good things in his life. The reasons he would put up with having blood on his hands. You were usually the first thing he brought up. And every time Bucky became more interested in meeting you. Frank warned him though, saying that the moment he suddenly became known to you that he would leave and never look back.

Now as much as James wanted to meet the college girl who had her brother wrapped around her finger. He knew he couldn’t afford to lose somebody with as good of a shot as he had when he was still in his fighting days. But he still wished.

It all came down to a day when Frank got caught up in his actual job at a factory where he loaded and unloaded large crates of merchandise that would go to most retail stores. You tried to call him, but you didn’t know that Bucky had tried to call him too. He needed his best shot for another important job but he couldn’t reach him. 

Now he knew that morally, he would be breaking a promise to a man who he needed. But he was the boss, not Frank. It was 2 in the morning in New York and it was freezing. You were worried because your brother usually came back to the apartment at 1:30. Blankets were layered on your cold body. Then you heard a knock on the door. You knew better than to answer.

“(Y/N) I know you’re home and considering the fact you have no heater, I’m pretty sure you’re up waiting for Frank too. Open up please,” you heard a raspy male voice speak through the wooden door that guarded you from them.

“Who are you? How do you know us?” You asked getting up from the small couch and inching closer to the door.

“I work with him. He’s told me about you, listen I just wanna wait for him. We we’re going to talk after work and he wasn’t there. C;mon it’s freezing out here doll.” He said waiting to hear your soft voice again.

“Okay, but I have knife.” You said, as you grabbed a large knife from the kitchen.

As soon as the door opened you saw two men. Both had blue eyes but they had different hair and they definitely didn’t look like they worked with Frank.

“You don’t work with my brother.” You said gripping the knife tighter than you had before.

“Easy there doll, I do work with him. In fact, I’m his boss. Now we’re gonna wait here and be civilized about this whole thing.” The man with rasp in his voice said.

So you waited for your brother. Terrified and cold. When Frank walked into his apartment his world fell apart inside. His innocent sister, was sat next to the man he had warned.

“Frank, about time. You weren’t at work, getting groceries I see. Sorry, I grew impatient. Have you not paid your phone bill yet?” Bucky said looking at the upset man in front of him.

“Can we talk outside?” Frank said.

“Sure, we can. Steve watch (Y/N) here please, wouldn’t want to leave the doll by herself now would we?” He said as Frank walked outside of the apartment with him.

“It’s over. I told you that you don’t get to cross that line.” He said to Bucky who straightened out his suit.

“I’m the man in charge here. You really wanna bite the hand that’s feeding you? You listen to me. I’m the only person keeping you and her alive right now. That little factory job isn’t getting you anywhere and you know it.” Bucky said anger coursing through him and the disrespect he felt.

“You don’t own me and you can find yourself a new shooter. She is not going to grow up around this shit. I won’t let it happen. You kill me and let her walk if you have to but she won’t ever see me do that horrible things i do.” Frank said, his mind in a frenzy.,

reblog.comment:

As soon as the door opened you saw two men. Both had blue eyes but they had different hair and they definitely didn’t look like they worked with Frank.

“You don’t work with my brother.” You said gripping the knife tighter than you had before.

“Easy there doll, I do work with him. In fact, I’m his boss. Now we’re gonna wait here and be civilized about this whole thing.” The man with rasp in his voice said.

So you waited for your brother. Terrified and cold. When Frank walked into his apartment his world fell apart inside. His innocent sister, was sat next to the man he had warned.

“Frank, about time. You weren’t at work, getting groceries I see. Sorry, I grew impatient. Have you not paid your phone bill yet?” Bucky said looking at the upset man in front of him.

“Can we talk outside?” Frank said.

“Sure, we can. Steve watch (Y/N) here please, wouldn’t want to leave the doll by herself now would we?” He said as Frank walked outside of the apartment with him.

“It’s over. I told you that you don’t get to cross that line.” He said to Bucky who straightened out his suit.

“I’m the man in charge here. You really wanna bite the hand that’s feeding you? You listen to me. I’m the only person keeping you and her alive right now. That little factory job isn’t getting you anywhere and you know it.” Bucky said anger coursing through him and the disrespect he felt.

“You don’t own me and you can find yourself a new shooter. She is not going to grow up around this shit. I won’t let it happen. You kill me and let her walk if you have to but she won’t ever see me do that horrible things i do.” Frank said, his mind in a frenzy.,
